title: Gentleman Gnar
body:
So in the store it comes up in the Featured, but not in the actual skins? 
Just though riot might wanna look into this :D

replies.body:
Yes, but you can find it if you search for it.

The sort by "release date" thing is broken. It has really old skins as listed only coming out recently.

dude i understand that and all but what I'm saying is that maybe riot might want to fiddle with some things to correct this, not that i couldn't find it, it was just to warn riot about it :D but thank you anyways
It's a glitch in the matrix. Oh wait no, that's just a problem that had continued since Riot gives no fooks about the store flaws.
